sentences.en: 'It must be forty feet high,'said they, grimly; and never moved.

sentences.en: "It's too late now to stop him," Harris said grimly.

sentences.en: He might be dead after tonight if he didn't stop all this crap, Michael thought grimly.

sentences.en: I have exercised like this — obsessively, a bit grimly — for years, but recently I began to wonder: Why am I doing this?
sentences.cn: 我痴迷得有点冷酷地这样锻炼了几年，可是，最近我开始疑惑：我为什么要这么做？

sentences.en: The helpless manager paced the floor and grimly endured the gloom of defeat.
